name: School Prison
description:
School Prison is a text adventure game based around the story of you being stuck in school, you have to get out. Every decision you make will affect you in the future.

This version is very basic, it sort of acts as a trailer you can play. It will be updated as time goes on to become a stronger and more interesting story, I will also add more stories into the game, then the title might change (That is why the file is called Text 101)

Anyway  I would love it if you gave some ideas on how I could make the story better and longer.

Thank you for playing!
